properties.address: Bethel Hall, Bethel Street, Llanidloes, Wales SY186BS
properties.description: We have a lovely indoor garden and a community café open to all. Dogs are welcome. We have books and games for children, and regularly organise activities and workshops (see https://www.facebook.com/HangingGardensLlanidloes/)
